main.name: Phi-Yen Vu
main.bio: Hi there! I am Phi-Yen! My goal is to work with startups and large corporations to help build and scale their companies.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to collaborate!

work.title: Project Manager - Finance Transformation
work.description: Analyze, Map, Measure and Optimize processes (VBA). Design specifications and user guides. Migrate, Update and Maintain Master Data from IBM Cognos TM1 to Anaplan system. Lead projects in their entirety with the support of other team members with Agile methodology (developers in Philippines, consultants, Business Intelligence team). Train financial collaborators. Create detailed project road maps, plans and schedules. Build, Support and Automate finance reporting and provide exploration capability for reporting users. Support key users and end users.

work.company: LIP6 - Sorbonne University and French National Center for Scientific Research
work.title: Research Student
work.description: Present results of a study undertaken to seek and assess Software Product Lines approaches for BPM through a Systematic Literature Review (SLR)
